data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 8
data.actual_result: The last line gets cut off. If you select the text again, it fixes itself.
data.short_description: Text in message input field gets cut off when closing keyboard
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel or DM - Write 3 lines of text (also works with more) - Move the cursor to the end of the last line (don‘t select any word) - Close your keyboard - Observe the last line of your text
